import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; const ViewUserModal = ({ show, handleClose, user }) => { if (!user) return null; return ( üëÅÔ∏è View Member Details
First Name: {user.firstName}
Last Name: {user.lastName}
Email: {user.email}
Phone: {user.phone || "N/A"}
Address: {user.address || "N/A"}
Role: {user.role}
); }; export default ViewUserModal;
